title: Elemental analysis and metabolic profiling of medicinally potent members of Zingiberaceae family using FT-IR and LIBS coupled with PLS-DA
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Saima Sohrab, Pratibha Mishra, Vishal Dwivedi, Pavel Veis, Ashok Kumar Pathak, Sanjay Kumar Mishra
